thread.title: Jay And Silent Bob Are Returning To The Big Screen
thread.title_full: Jay And Silent Bob Are Returning To The Big Screen

author: Robbie Fox
title: Jay And Silent Bob Are Returning To The Big Screen
text:
Jay And Silent Bob Are Returning To The Big Screen Robbie Fox | A photo posted by Kevin Smith (@thatkevinsmith) on Feb 9, 2017 at 1:54pm PST 
tl;dr- Kevin Smith tried to get Clerks III made, but Jeff Anderson (Randall) is out, so that’s scrapped. Then he tried to get Mallrats 2 made, and it went from a movie to a TV show, and no networks picked it up, so that’s scrapped. He still wants to bring Jay and Silent Bob back, and those are the only two characters he owns still, so he got to work on a screenplay. 
As for the plot, a movie studio is going into production on a Bluntman and Chronic reboot, and Jay and Silent Bob are gonna try to stop that from happening. Which is, basically, the exact plot from Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back. But hey, fuck it, I’m excited! 
If you’re wondering why the MMA guy is blogging about a Kevin Smith movie, it’s because I’m a big Kevin Smith guy. Like, Y GE. My “Why not?” tattoo is inspired by this speech he gave in 2012… 
I cared enough about this fucker to get one of his quotes permanently inked on my skin and see his movie about a guy getting turned into a god damn walrus multiple times in theaters. 
Jay and Silent Bob coming back is essentially my Super Bowl. Like, if the Super Bowl happened 6 times ever and the most recent one was in 2006. Not a great analogy but you get the fucking point. I’m thrilled. Robbie Fox |
